column1: PLACEMENT OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE FOR WHOM LOCAL AUTHORITIES MAINTAIN A STATEMENT OF SPECIAL EDUCATIONAL NEEDS (SEN), OR EHC PLAN BY EACH LOCAL AUTHORITY (1)
By region and Local Authority area in England

column4: Total children and young people for whom the authority maintains a statement of SEN, or EHC plan

column1: (1) Only statutory EHC plans are recorded in 2015. Non-statutory EHC plans issued by pathfinder local authorities are not included in the 2015 SEN2 collection.
(2) Expressed as a percentage of total children and young people for whom the authority maintains a statement of SEN, or EHC plan.
Totals may not appear to equal the sum of the component parts because numbers have been rounded to the nearest 5. Percentages are rounded to the nearest 0.1.
x 1 or 2 children or young people, or a non-zero percentage based on 1 or 2 children or young people
To protect the suppressed number, secondary suppression may be required in some cases.
